author: Kanwar Yogendra
text:
The Shimla Municipal Corporation has suspended distribution of water from Ashwani Khad (a drinking water source) which is found to be contaminated. Parts of the hill town have been facing the outbreak of jaundice from past few weeks.

Shimla Mayor Sanjay Chauhan on Wednesday said the Corporation would continue with its alternative supply from Gumma and Giri rivulets in the affected suburbs of the town.

“We are waiting for the final test reports of the contaminated water from the NIB laboratory Pune”, he said.
title: Water supply from Ashwani Khad suspended
